abstract: Commercial fishermen and fish farmers in Pacific Northwest are alarmed over discovery of infectious salmon anemia in prized wild Pacific salmon, with much uncertainty about what its potential impact could be; deadly virus has devastated farmed fish in Chile.
snippet: As word spread that infectious salmon anemia had been found in prized wild Pacific salmon, there remained much uncertainty about what its potential impact could be.
lead_paragraph: As word spread that infectious salmon anemia had been found in prized wild Pacific salmon, there remained much uncertainty about what its potential impact could be.

headline.main: Knot of Worry Tightens for Fishermen
headline.print_headline: Knot of Worry Tightens for Fishermen
headline.seo: Seattle Worries as Word of Infectious Salmon Anemia Spreads
